nodes.text: Capital Cay was a port city on Aquilaris during the Republic Dark Age. Control of the city shifted throughout the internecine New Sith Wars. By 1032 BBY, it was occupied by Daimanate forces. However, it was attacked by both Grace Command and Zodoh's criminal empire during the Aquilaris campaign. Following a three-way battle, the Republic-affiliated Grace Command occupied the city and liberated the slaves.
